CustomField.formula: IF (ISBLANK(Booking_Type_Fx__c),"","Booking Type: " + Booking_Type_Fx__c+ BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Site_Instructions__c),"","Site Instructions: " + Site_Instructions__c + BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Hazards__c),"","Hazards: " + Hazards__c + BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Comments__c),"","Comments: " + Comments__c + BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Job_Instructions__c),"","Job Instructions: " + Job_Instructions__c + BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Key_Number__c),"","Key Number: " + Key_Number__c + BR()) + IF (ISBLANK(Article_Count__c),"","Article Count: " + Article_Count__c + BR()) + IF (Booking_Record_Type__c = 'MPB Pickup',"Contact Name: " + Contact_Name__c + BR() + "Contact Number: " + Contact_Phone_Number__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Job Information
